featured.text: If the process can be replicated in humans, it may give rise to new treatments for blindness caused by retinal damage.

definition.zh_def: 視網膜的，與視網膜有關的
definition.en_def: Relating to the retina, the light-sensitive layer at the back of the eye.
definition.example: The doctor examined the retinal images to check for any abnormalities.
